jump_scares.spoiler: After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
The sticky hand hits the wall
The door is pushed open
The booth door blows open after the lights flicker
After a tense scene a girl walks by laughing
While Oliver is holding the camera up, the skeleton face growls loudly
The lightbulbs start to break
The table starts to move
A chair moves when she says “Hello
There is a jump cut back to Larry attacking Byron
The closet door is pushed open
There is a loud crunch as Larry is seen in the reflection of the window
The hand in the screen cracks before Larry attacks
Larry appears in the window and growls
Larry drops down to the floor
Larry charges out of the grass
Courtney’s phone makes a high pitched screaming noise
The sound of the shower curtain being pulled back during a tense scene may startle some viewers
An unseen force suddenly flings Courtney into the air
The figure in the hospital mirror suddenly rushes forward and the mirror cracks
Courtney’s head suddenly turns and a sound effect plays
As the countdown timer reaches zero, Evan falls onto the stairs
Quinn closes the laptop screen and briefly sees an apparition of demonic Evan in front of her
A hand suddenly appears on the car window startling Quinn
As Quinn looks again in the reversing camera, ghastly hands suddenly cover her eyes
A demonic boy hisses and throws himself at Matt
A man puts his hand on Matt’s shoulder
A ghastly hand pulls Quinn under the covers
The entire bed is suddenly flung into the air as Jordan hides from the demon
Jordan looks around and the demon screams “Where is she?”
As Matt says “We did it, they let me go” he is suddenly hit by a car
As Jordan looks at the countdown timer, the demon suddenly rushes towards her
The demon attacks Jordan from behind
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
A girl turns around and Jason is standing behind her
Gibb flicks her cigarette butt and it lands on Jason
Gibb opens the door and Trey and Blake are standing outside
Blake suddenly appears around the corner, startling Lori and Kia
Trey looks up and sees Jason standing over the bed
Freddy’s face suddenly appears beside Lori and she wakes up. [Video]
Blake’s father’s head suddenly falls off into Blake’s lap
Lori’s father briefly morphs into Freddy
Freddy’s hand comes out of the book Kia is reading
A figure passes by the camera
Freddy’s silhouette suddenly appears
A face suddenly appears from the wall behind Gibb
Freddy suddenly rips the locker door off its hinges and attacks Gibb
Lori’s father taps on her car window, startling her
Will suddenly grabs Lori
Mark closes the bathroom cabinet and glimpses Freddy in the mirror
Freddy suddenly appears in front of Lori
Lori opens her hand to reveal she is holding a bloody ear
Freeburg is attacked by the strange bug-like creature
Jason breaks through a glass door
A woman’s corpse suddenly appears floating in Jason’s closet
Jason suddenly wakes up as Kia attempts to resuscitate him
Jason suddenly bursts into the cabin
Jason suddenly appears and slams Kia into a tree with his knife
An actor for the horror maze jumps out at the girls
Another actor jumps out from behind them
Another actor jumps out from the blue curtains to the left side of the corridor
A robot witch comes out from the wall
A robot jester comes out from the wall
One of the park actors scares Natalie with a chainsaw while she’s talking to Gavin
An actor dressed as a clown jumps in front of Natalie and Gavin while they’re walking
The actor standing still turns and screams at Taylor
A cloaked actor jumps in front of group
Brooke turns around to leave and runs into Quinn
A mechanical spider drops down from the ceiling in front of Brooke and Quinn
The dead man Ash is looking inside assuming it was a prop suddenly grabs him
One of the actors grabs Taylor and lifts her up
Lights suddenly turn on above the doctor sitting on the chair and he turns to look at the group
The woman on the mattress grabs Ash as he is reaching for the syringe
A hand grabs Brooke from above the fog
One of the hands touches Taylor, frightening her
The lights of a train suddenly turn on behind Ash and Quinn and its horn goes off
The killer bangs on the glass
A light turns on in front of Ash and there is a cut to a growling gargoyle
The killer suddenly opens his eyes as Ash shines the flashlight on him
One of the park actors growls and runs at the group

As Natalie is drying her hair, the camera cuts to the empty bathroom stalls. It then cuts back to Natalie drying her hair and when it cuts to the stalls again the killer is standing right in front of her
The killer’s hand slowly reaches for Natalie’s hair and then suddenly pulls down accompanied by a loud thud sound
A mechanical prop springs out of the box after Brooke says “He’s not in here.
There is a sudden growl
A prop appears on the wall, frightening Brooke. The same prop appears on two more walls as she runs through the hall
The killer’s axe suddenly slashes through the wall
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
There is a slight scare when a walkie talkie makes a loud noise as Georgie descends the stairs to the basement
There is another minor scare as we see Pennywise’s eyes appear at the drain grill in front of Georgie
There is a loud bang on a door as Mike takes out some rubbish
After a rather intense scene, Mike is almost run over by Henry’s car
The distorted woman from the painting appears in front of Stan
In the library basement, Ben is running away from a headless man when Pennywise suddenly appears in front of him and shouts “Egg Boy”
Ben is jumped by Patrick as he leaves the library (this is a very minor jump scare)
Patrick enters the sewerage system and uses an aerosol can and lighter flamethrower style as he hunts for Ben, suddenly he sees various dead children standing in front of him
Patrick sees a balloon in front of him and it pops to reveal Pennywise standing there
The hair from the drain suddenly winds itself around Beverly’s wrist
In the kitchen, Georgie rushes past the screen in the foreground as Bill looks on
Bill sees Georgie in the flooded basement, he slowly begins to decay and suddenly Pennywise rushes through the water towards Bill

The children are in Bill’s garage looking at various slides on a projector screen that suddenly begins to take on a life of its own. Pennywise appears on the projector screen and the kids panic and attempt to turn the projector off. Suddenly Pennywise is coming out of the projector and into the room with them
In the Neibolt street house  Richie, Bill, and Eddie see Betty begging for help at a doorway when she is suddenly pulled off screen
After Richie finds himself locked in the room full of clowns, Richie turns around and a clown doll is standing right behind him and he gets a scare

In a room full of clowns, Richie walks towards a coffin and opens it. The scene is quite suspenseful and we expect a jump scare upon the coffin being opened however the scare doesn’t occur until after Richie closes the lid and Pennywise jumps up from behind
Bill and Richie go through a door marked “not scary” and after a couple of seconds the light is turned on and we see Betty Ripson hanging by ropes
In perhaps the only truly unexpected jump scare, Beverly turns around to leave the bathroom after a confrontation with her father and is attacked by Pennywise who is standing behind her
Beverly notices a music box playing, the music stops and a second later we get a slight jump scare as a toy clown pops out of the box
Stan hears someone whispering his name, he shines the torch down the tunnel and sees Pennywise briefly appear at the opening
Stan looks around with a torch and there is a scare when the distorted woman from the painting rushes at Stan
Eddie slips into the water in a sewer tunnel and sees several floating corpses
There is a slight scare when Georgie’s motionless body suddenly starts to shake
A ladder cracks while Dalton is climbing it
A voice in the baby monitor yells “NOW”
Renai sees a man standing behind her daughter’s crib
The burglar alarm goes off
The burglar alarm goes off again
Renai wakes from a nightmare
A strange man walks through Renai’s bedroom before lunging at her
A small boy runs behind Renai
The door bursts open behind Renai
The small boy opens the wardrobe door and runs out in front of Renai
Lorraine sees a red faced demon standing behind Josh
Tucker sees the image of two women in dresses through his UV light camera
There is a cracking sound and a bright flash of light, followed by several more flashes of light over the next few minutes
Dalton suddenly appears beside the table
A woman in a wedding dress walks past Josh
A strange smiling family suddenly appear in front of Josh
A man suddenly appears in front of the red door
A red faced demon appears beside Josh
A hand reaches out of the drawer as it is being closed
The door bursts open and the strange screaming family are revealed
Tucker shines a torch on a mysterious man
Dalton opens the door in his bedroom and the red demon jumps out from behind
The demon grabs Daltons leg from underneath the bed
A mysterious lady lunges at Elise
Young Elise reaches into a wardrobe and is attacked by a mysterious presence
The scene abruptly changes to a close up of dead Elise
Renai trips over a babies toy which begins to make noise
A kids toy suddenly turns on
Lorraine opens the bathroom door to reveal Josh
A mysterious lady appears standing behind Lorraine and Dalton
A singing lady appears in the living room
The kids high chair and toy suddenly go flying through the air
The mysterious lady appears suddenly, yells “Don’t you dare”, and slaps Renai. [Video]
Several images flash on the screen in quick succession as Carl senses something. [Video]
While in a hospital bed, Parker suddenly grabs young Josh
Renai suddenly wakes from a nightmare
Kids suddenly run out of the bedroom
A lady runs out of Dalton’s closet
Numerous apparitions appear beside Dalton’s bed. [Video]
The scene suddenly cuts to Josh yelling for help in “the further”
An old man suddenly appears in front of Josh chanting “he’s got your baby”. [Video]
A man appears in the window of the babies room
Josh’s face suddenly transforms into that of the evil lady
Josh backs into a room full of shrouded people
Josh lifts the shroud to reveal the mother of Parker who begins attacking Josh
Josh and Carl are surrounded and attacked by a bunch of spirits
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat

Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar

Something bangs on the bedroom window

The entity whooshes past the camera

The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
Dennis turns around and gasps as Kristi is standing right behind him
A photo-frame falls off the wall as an earthquake begins suddenly
Julie jumps out of the closet wearing a mask, scaring Dennis and Randy. [Video]
Dennis bursts into the bedroom
There is a loud bang in the kitchen as the blinds snap shut
There is a loud thump as Julie enters the bathroom where the two girls are playing bloody Mary
There is a loud bang in the kitchen while Julie has her hand in the garbage disposal unit
Katie crawls into a cupboard and the door slams shut behind her
As the camera pans back to the kitchen, the babysitter’s face suddenly appears in front of it
The camera pans back to the kitchen and there is a figure covered by a blanket standing behind the  babysitter. The blanket crumples to the floor as the babysitter turns around
The babysitter goes to look at something but there is a whooshing noise and she is pushed back
There is a hissing noise and Randi is attacked by something while the lights are off
The table and chairs in the children’s room are suddenly pushed over
An invisible force pulls Katie off the ground by her hair
Katie’s sheets are pulled off the bed and fly towards the camera
Julie returns to the kitchen and notices everything has been removed from the kitchen, seconds later all the kitchen items fall from the ceiling. [Video]
Dennis turns on the light in the garage and a group of older women are standing in there
Julie is thrown at Dennis
Dennis opens the door slowly, and there is a whooshing noise
A now possessed Katie turns around and snarls at Dennis before throwing him backwards. [Video]
Sadako’s hand reaches out of the computer
A man walks out to the road and gets hit by a bus
As the laptop flies towards the screen Sadako’s hair suddenly bursts out of it towards the camera
As Morisaki picks up her phone Sadako’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs her by the arm
There is a loud sound of something banging against a window
Akane turns around and Kitayama is standing right in front of her
Sadako jumps out of the PC and grabs Akane by the shoulder
As Koiso turns around there is a cut to Sadako standing right in front of the camera
Takanori calls out to Akane, causing her to turn around and see him hanging from a noose
Koiso touches the wall, causing the wallpaper to turn into a group of moths and fly at him

Sadako’s hand reaches out of the phone and grabs Akane

Bughuul’s face on Ellison’s laptop begins to move
Ellison lowers the print of Bughuul’s face only to see the same face mirrored in the backyard outside. [Video]
Ellison sees Trevor’s face hiding in the bushes
Several deceased children are seen standing behind Ellison

A deceased girl appears beside Ellison. [Video]
A deceased girl in a yellow coat appears in the hallway

Bughuul’s face suddenly appears in front of Ellison while he is peering into the attic. [Video]
A box labelled home movies drops from the attic and lands on the floor beside Ellison
Bughuul’s face abruptly drops into view, just before the final credits roll. [Video]
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
A boy suddenly appears behind another boy who is lying in bed. [Video]
Dylan calls out “mom” during a tense scene
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, one of the people hanging upside down in the tape is attacked by an alligator in the water
The image of Bughuul can briefly be seen on the laptop screen

Bughuul can be seen in the reflection of the window
A bucket suddenly slides along the ground

The deputy’s phone suddenly rings which startles him
The deputy sees Bughuul in one of the images he is looking through, suddenly Bughuul appears to move towards him. [Video]
The radio suddenly begins playing
Dylan sees Bughuul in front of him
Dylan turns around and the ghost children are standing in front of him
The ghost children’s faces turn demonic
One of the ghost children pops up from the basement as Dylan runs away, seconds later Dylan runs into more of the ghost children
A young girl appears behind the deputy
Zack closes the chest to reveal the ghost children standing in front of him
The radio begins playing again
A face jumps in front of the camera before the credits start. [Video]
Larry looks inside a window and sees a white-eyed woman
A telephone rings
A hand reaches out through a dissolving hole in a wall, and attacks Joe
The camera zooms in on Martha, and immediately after the camera switches over on a decomposing corpse, floating on the surface in some water
The camera switches over to the white-eyed woman
As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her
Jill turns around and sees two corpses
Jill opens a door and runs into a one-eyed zombie
Jill opens her eyes and reveals that her eyes are now white
As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder
Martha discovers a re-animated Joe in the bathtub, that attacks her
The camera shifts over on a piano, that suddenly starts playing
Emily ducks her head down, and a zombie is standing behind her
A Zombie appears in front of the screen
Emily is crawling as the camera movers upwards to reveal another zombie
Dickie (the dog) turns around, and brutally kills Emily
Liza is suddenly attacked by the re-animated hotel worker
A unseen force suddenly hits Liza and John with thunderstorm, and blood starts dripping down on them
A zombie smashes through the window, and attacks Liza
The glass in a door suddenly breaks, and Dr. Harris is impaled by the glass splinter
A zombie leaps up, and attacks Liza
John opens a door, and sees a zombie slowly walking towards him and Liza
Jill suddenly attack Liza
A loud gunshot during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice
Janet starts talking again and is revealed to be standing directly in front of Margaret’s bed
A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]
A telephone rings during a quiet scene
Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor
A man yells and the bed sheets are pulled off Janet’s bed
The bedside cabinet suddenly slides across the room
A tape player suddenly turns on during a tense scene
After putting her hands around the painting the nun suddenly runs at Lorraine. [Video]
Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]
Through an opening in the door Peggy sees Janet be pulled away and replaced with Bill
Peggy looks down and sees Bill’s face in the water. He reaches out and grabs Peggy’s arm
Janet reappears in the kitchen holding a knife
The nun puts her hand on Bill’s shoulder. [Video]
Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

jump_scares.spoiler: There is banging on the door
The shower shoots blood onto David
David charges forward with a knife
After a very tense scene Arne sees a woman who grabs him
The chainsaw starts up again in Arne’s hand
The demon Bruno charges out of the shadows
A hand comes out of the water bed
Arne’s head is grabbed by the demon behind him
Two girls with flashlights appear running and laughing
Lorraine is grabbed by a demon hand
The body in the corner reanimates and runs at Ed
The woman is behind Lorraine after she closes the door
A loud bang startles the two girls
The door to the girl’s bedroom slams shut
Carolyn searches the house and a loud bang erupts from paintings falling off the wall
Carolyn enters the basement but as she goes to leave the door slams in her face
Hands clap behind Carolyn while she is in the basement
A monster appears on the top of the girl’s closet
A sheet blows off the washing line and catches around a figure
As Roger leaves a room, a lady shouts “look what you made me do!”
Lorraine pulls away the music box revealing an old lady behind it
Legs fall down from the side of the table as Lorraine looks out from underneath
Nancy’s hair gets pulled upwards
One of the children gets pulled in their bed
The title credits appearing on the screen accompanied by a sound effect may startle some
A door opens loudly
After seeing water drip on the floor, Carlos looks up and La Llorona is hovering right above him
La Llorona suddenly runs out of the shadows and grabs Chris around the arm
As Chris shuts the car door, La Llorona appears at the window
The car lock suddenly pops up
Sam lifts the umbrella out of the water and La Llorona suddenly appears in front of her
An unseen force suddenly pushes the door open as Anna holds Chris
The alarm clock suddenly goes off
La Llorona suddenly rushes at Chris from behind the curtains
La Llorona comes out of the room behind Chris and tackles him
La Llorona pushes Sam under the water
Chris points and says “Mom”, causing Anna to look around and see La Llorona’s face right beside her
There is a loud roar from upstairs
Anna and the childen look up to see La Llorona towering above them
The figure under the tablecloth suddenly rushes at the children
The glass behind Rafael suddenly cracks
An unseen force hurls Sam backwards
A shrieking La Llorona suddenly swims at Anna as she approaches Sam
As the sheet drops to reveal La Llorona’s reflection, the glass shatters and she screams at the children
A hand knocks out the garbage bag
The woman suddenly takes the hand of Detective Muldoon
After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
When Goodman’s colleague in the car turns around again, a screaming woman knocks on the car window. This is very startling
The camera pans to the left where suddenly a zombie stands in the light cone
Hands suddenly come out of the bathtub and reach for Peter
Peter turns around and suddenly the dead woman stands in front of him and screams at him
Suddenly the screaming ghost appears in the left corner of the cupboard
A screaming ghost appears over Faith. The sound effect is very sudden
A screaming ghost appears in the car behind Lorna
When Detective Muldoon turns off the light, a ghost appears before her
The ghost appears once again
The ghost suddenly opens the door
Just after the son runs into the dark corner of the room, the female ghost comes out of it shortly after and murmurs to Detective Muldoon
After it turns out that it is not Muldoon’s real son in her arms, the screaming spirit of a child suddenly appears in her arms
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
Various small scares for the next few seconds as actors scare the group
As the doll girl appears there is a sudden scream
Someone jumps out of the curtains as someone says “ashes
Mickey is scared by a man in a mask
A little girl comes out from the left side and then a few seconds later a man comes out of the wall directly in front of the camera
As the camera is facing the mirror there is a sudden cut
The lights come on and reveal a lot of clowns surrounding the vehicle
He is jumped by the doll girl
Mikey slams a hand against the window
Matt sees a frightening vision in a basement window
A figure can be seen in a mirror as Sara opens a closet door
Matt turns around to see that the water Sara is mopping the floor with has turned to blood
Some plates fall on the floor and break
Matt gets a shock from the door in the basement
Matt has a vision where his hand sinks through a pillar and gets stuck in rotting meat
Matt begins to have another vision
Sara turns around and is surprised by Matt standing in the doorway
A figure runs past Matt
The door slams behind Matt
One of the corpses in the mortuary begins to move
Several of the tattooed corpses are now standing around Matt
Matt sits up and comes face to face with a burnt figure
The burnt figure disappears in a bright flash
Matt starts to have another vision involving Jonah and Aickman
Wendy wakes up as a bird hits the window
As Wendy goes to lift a sheet covering the bird, a foot suddenly appears in view
Sara turns on the bed-side light and sees a corpse standing in front of her. [Video]
The furnace door shuts as Nicholas tries to examine it
Jonah’s spirit suddenly moves closer to Sara and Matt
Jonah’s spirit now stands right behind Sara and Matt
Nicholas looks in the rear view mirror and sees a burnt corpse
A corpse flashes up on the screen during a flash-back to Jonah
The shower curtain suddenly wraps itself around Wendy
An axehead breaks through the door in front of Wendy
A corpse falls down in front of Matt and Sara
A bloodied hand comes out of the darkness startling the praying nun
The nun on the ground is pulled away into the darkness
The corpse of the nun hanging from the rope suddenly drops to the ground as a group of ravens fly away
The camera pans around Frenchie several times before a nun corpse drops from a tree knocking him to the ground
After watching a shadowy figure move across the room, Irene looks up at the statue of Jesus when Valek suddenly appears behind Irene’s shoulders and glass shatters over her
Shortly after lighting a match in the coffin, Burke hears some noises and Valek’s hands suddenly grab him and pull him down
A nun grabs Irene by the hand as she approaches the praying nuns
After Burke touches the veil of the abbess, she suddenly turns to reveal she has been possessed by Valek
After Irene picks up a bead from the floor, a nun is standing directly behind her
As Irene looks at the rosary, Valek’s hands break through the wall behind her
As a screaming Irene flees, a hand is placed over her mouth by one of the nuns
As Burke walks towards the exorcised boy, Valek suddenly appears
We see a top down shot of the nuns praying together in a circular pattern. The scene briefly goes quiet before an unseen force flings the nuns across the room
After Burke investigates the ringing noise, a hand reaches out of the ground in front of him
After Irene begins to pray a possessed nun attacks the group
Something roars at Frenchie from the darkness as he walks through the catacombs
A faceless nun appears behind Irene. As she turns around to talk to it another nun appears from the side and attacks her
Frenchie hears a noise as he moves through the group of nuns
There is another slight scare as a nun’s head jerks down behind where Frenchie is standing
As Frenchie approaches Irene she suddenly looks up and roars revealing she has been possessed
The possessed boy from the exorcism drops down behind Burke
A previously quiet scene is interrupted by high pitched static
A man wearing a scary mask appears in front of the camera (accompanied by a sound effect)
Michael suddenly jolts awake
The medium suddenly grabs Michael and there is a burst of static
Michael suddenly screams as the footage distorts and we get another burst of static
The footage cuts to a close up of a stereo accompanied by a loud static noise
During Michael’s hypnotism, everything goes quiet briefly before Michael suddenly appears standing directly in front of the camera
A bird flies into the window
Ellie’s toy makes a noise from behind Michael
A trashcan falls over making a loud noise
Michael in the television footage suddenly turns and looks at the real Michael and once again this is accompanied by a static sound effect
Michael opens a drawer to reveal a bloodied knife and a static sound effect plays once more
Something sparks in the background after Michael says “Why are you doing this?
The book Michael is reading from is suddenly thrown away by an unseen force
Michael violently spasms several times as he lies handcuffed to the bed
As Michael reaches for the phone of the floor, a bloodied hand hangs down from the ceiling
Michael headbutts the mirror
The plug holding the hairdryer explodes
After Michael jumps out of the house, we see Michael lying motionless on the ground for several seconds before we hear a thudding noise and the camera moves slightly
As Samantha bends down to pick up the coin, a car slams into her
After pouring a drink, Herman heads back to his game and hears a loud bang from another room
Herman pulls away the sheets on his bed revealing no one is there. He then spins around and a man is standing behind him
Lights flicker down the hallway revealing a girl standing at the end of it
Herman spins his head back to the hallway but the girl is standing right in front of him
Herman spins around to face Clarissa and sees a man in underwear standing outside
The man in underwear is suddenly standing inside the house
Herman pulls away the sheets to reveal a screaming little girl underneath
Something splashes in the pool
The body lying on the table suddenly jolts upwards after the cameraman begins to cover her face with a sheet
Aliens burst into the room
After the police disappear, aliens suddenly appear in the field
Aliens appear in the field in front of the camera
Ayesha suddenly attacks Larry
Ayesha suddenly appears in front of the partially open closet and is shot by Larry
